issue_title: [Feature] 添加 Todo 优先级字段支持

implementation_summary.description: Added priority field support to Todo dataclass with CLI integration
changes: src/flywheel/todo.py: Added priority field with default value 2 (medium), validation in from_dict for range 1-3
src/flywheel/cli.py: Added --priority/-p argument to add command
src/flywheel/formatter.py: Updated format_todo to display priority symbol (! for high, - for medium, . for low)

acceptance_criteria_met: Todo supports optional priority field (default value 2)
